Freakonomics Radio http://www.wnyc.org/articles/freakonomics-podcast/ Hiii! In their books "Freakonomics" and "SuperFreakonomics," Steven D. Levitt and Stephen J. Dubner explore "the hidden side of everything," with stories about cheating schoolteachers, self-dealing real-estate agents, and crack-selling mamaâ€™s boys. The Freakonomics Radio podcast, hosted by Dubner, carries on that tradition with weekly episodes. Prepare to be enlightened, engaged, perhaps enraged, and definitely surprised. en-us Tue, 25 Oct 2011 17:17:21 -0400 600
